name: This level is broken
description:
This Level Is Broken

Hello my friend! Interested in a new challenge? Sure you are! All you got to do is to reach the exit of this level. Walk to the button, press it, jump up the platforms, pass through the gate and their you are. Easy, right? Then lets begin!

____________

How to Play:
A / D: Move to left / right
W / SPACE: Jump
E: Enter the exit
TAB: Show hint to solve the level
ESC: Opens Restart Menu (Can't be used in FullScreen)

____________

This game is an entry for the Coding Blocks Game Jam 2021. The theme was "Evereything is broken". So I tried to create a game, which has a lots of broken bugs (or in this case broken "features"). 

____________

Sources: 
Sprites, music and sounds are created by myself (Sounds are created with sfxr)
Fonts: MS Jokerman (Aw yeah!), 7-Segment-Font (http://www.loosweb.de/scale/doc/de/7seg.html)
